django.utils.archive
====================

.. py:module:: django.utils.archive

   django.utils.archive.extension_map

Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.utils.archive.extract


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:exception:: ArchiveException

   Bases: :py:obj:`Exception`


   Base exception class for all archive errors.


.. py:exception:: UnrecognizedArchiveFormat

   Bases: :py:obj:`ArchiveException`


   Error raised when passed file is not a recognized archive format.


.. py:function:: extract(path, to_path)

   Unpack the tar or zip file at the specified path to the directory
   specified by to_path.


.. py:class:: Archive(file)

   The external API class that encapsulates an archive implementation.


   .. py:method:: extract(to_path)


   .. py:method:: list()


   .. py:method:: close()


.. py:class:: BaseArchive

   Base Archive class.  Implementations should inherit this class.


   .. py:method:: split_leading_dir(path)


   .. py:method:: has_leading_dir(paths)

      Return True if all the paths have the same leading path name
      (i.e., everything is in one subdirectory in an archive).



   .. py:method:: target_filename(to_path, name)


   .. py:method:: extract()
      :abstractmethod:



   .. py:method:: list()
      :abstractmethod:



.. py:class:: TarArchive(file)

   Bases: :py:obj:`BaseArchive`


   Base Archive class.  Implementations should inherit this class.


   .. py:method:: list(*args, **kwargs)


   .. py:method:: extract(to_path)


   .. py:method:: close()


.. py:class:: ZipArchive(file)

   Bases: :py:obj:`BaseArchive`


   Base Archive class.  Implementations should inherit this class.


   .. py:method:: list(*args, **kwargs)


   .. py:method:: extract(to_path)


   .. py:method:: close()


.. py:data:: extension_map
